_header: Saint Luke tells that Christ himself
_description: Gospel for Quinquagesima Sunday in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
SAynte luke tellis vs þat criste him selueToke to him his
                    dissiples twelue…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of swilk prayers ihesus ne kepesþaire lippis spekis
                    & þe hert slepes
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc seiþ þat crist him selueTok to hym his diciples
                    twelue…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of such preyere Ihesu ne kepesÞat lippes gon and herte
                    slepes
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Assumpsit Ihesu xij discipulos suos & ait illis (f.
                        180rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Seynt Luk vs telles þat crist him selfToke til him his
                    disciples tuelfe…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Of swilk prayere crist noght kepesyore lippes gose and
                    þe herte slepes

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt luke seyth þat crist hym seluetoke to him his disciplis
                    twelue…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Of swich preyere ihesu ne kepisþat lippes gom &
                    herte slepis
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica in quinquagesima Euangelius secundum Lucam capitulo
                            xviiio
(f. 87)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sant luke telles þat crist hym selfeTuke to hym hys discipls
                    twefe…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Of swylk a prayer ihesu ne kepesþare lyppes gase
                    þaire her slepes

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke telles þat cryste hyselfTuke to hym his dysciples
                    twelfe…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Of swilk a prayer ihesu ne kepysThayr lyppes gays þair
                    hert slepys

BLHar4196.First Lines: Oure godspell sais how crist him selueToke to him desciples twelue…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Slike prayers may no thing auayleBot wasted es all swilk trauayle
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Assumsit ihesu crist xii discipulos suos.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica in quinquagesima Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 40va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.23-28.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte luke tels þat criste hym selfetuke till hym hys
                    disciples twelfe…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…of swylk prayer ihesus ne kepesþare lyppys gasse &
                    þe herte slepes

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Luc seyth þat crist hym selueTok to hym his dysciplis
                    tweluie…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Off suche pryer god noght kepythþat lyppis goth and hert
                    slepyth
